body: Hi everyone, I am trying to run a  radiance study where I measure the cumulative solar radiation on a grid over the year - (grid based simulation type 1) However I am confused as to how to set the solar gain properties of the glass which is in front of the grid. How do I do that? As far as I can see only the visible light transmittance properties of the glass can be set.
